channel.title: Get Sleepy
channel.description: Welcome to the ultimate bedtime story podcast. Our soothing stories combine relaxing music, mindfulness techniques, and ASMR triggers to help you relax and fall asleep fast.
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to the ultimate bedtime story podcast. Our soothing stories combine relaxing music, mindfulness techniques, and ASMR triggers to help you relax and fall asleep fast.
channel.itunes:author: Get Sleepy
channel.itunes:keywords: meditation, sleepy, story, sleep, insomnia, relax, asmr, fall asleep

item.title: Gold in the Hills
item.description:
Welcome back sleepyheads. Tonight, we'll explore the beautiful Alaskan countryside, where an old, abandoned gold mine leaves memories of a past era üò¥

  • New to Get Sleepy? Subscribe!
  • Loving Get Sleepy? Rate us on Apple Podcasts

Tonight's Episode

First, give yourself time to relax and ease each part of your body one by one. Then, fall asleep among the rolling hills of Alaska.

  • Story Narrator: TK Kellman

About Get Sleepy

Get Sleepy is a twice weekly story-telling podcast designed to help you get a great night‚Äôs rest. By combining sleep meditation with a relaxing bedtime story, each episode will guide you gently towards sleep.

Feedback? Let us know your thoughts.

That's all for tonight. Sleep well, friends üò¥‚ù§Ô∏è

item.itunes:title: Gold in the Hills
item.itunes:author: Thomas Jones, TK Kellman
item.itunes:summary: Just beyond a quiet Alaskan town, a long-forgotten treasure lies hidden among the mountains. Narrated by TK Kellman.
item.itunes:subtitle: Just beyond a quiet Alaskan town, a long-forgotten treasure lies hidden among the mountains. Narrated by TK Kellman.

item.title: Jupiter and His Mighty Company
item.description:
Welcome back sleepyheads. Tonight's story takes us back in time with a legend about the Greek god Jupiter, also known as Zeus üò¥

  • New to Get Sleepy? Subscribe!
  • Loving Get Sleepy? Rate us on Apple Podcasts

Tonight's Episode

First, feel your heart warm and your body relax with a moment of gratitude. Then, discover the realm of the Greek gods as you drift off to sleep.

  • Story Narrator: Suzanne

About Get Sleepy

Get Sleepy is a twice weekly story-telling podcast designed to help you get a great night‚Äôs rest. By combining sleep meditation with a relaxing bedtime story, each episode will guide you gently towards sleep.

Feedback? Let us know your thoughts.

That's all for tonight. Sleep well, friends üò¥‚ù§Ô∏è

item.title: The Glassblower's Apprentice
item.description:
Welcome back sleepyheads. Tonight, we've got a classic love story, re-written with modern themes, and just in time for Valentine's Day. Whether you're a lovebird or not, this story is sure to warm your heart üíùüò¥

  • New to Get Sleepy? Subscribe!
  • Loving Get Sleepy? Rate us on Apple Podcasts

Tonight's Episode

We'll start with a relaxation to help you settle into bed. Then, join Asher, a modest apprentice, on his magical journey to meet the princess at the annual ball.

  • Story Narrator: Thomas Jones

About Get Sleepy

Get Sleepy is a twice weekly story-telling podcast designed to help you get a great night‚Äôs rest. By combining sleep meditation with a relaxing bedtime story, each episode will guide you gently towards sleep.

Feedback? Let us know your thoughts.

That's all for tonight. Sleep well, friends üò¥‚ù§Ô∏è

item.title: The Night Garden
item.description:

  • New to Get Sleepy? Subscribe!

First, guided breathing will help you relax into bed. After that, Abbe will lead you on a magical adventure through a luscious and unique garden.

item.title: The Return Flight
item.description:
Welcome back sleepyheads. Tonight, we'll be flying alongside a flock of birds on our way to dreamland üò¥

  • New to Get Sleepy? Subscribe!
  • Loving Get Sleepy? Rate us on Apple Podcasts

Tonight's Episode

First, guided sleep affirmations will help you prepare for a night of rest. Then, we will spread our imaginary wings and take to the skies with British barn swallows, as they migrate from South Africa all the way to England.

  • Story Narrator: Thomas Jones

About Get Sleepy

Get Sleepy is a twice weekly story-telling podcast designed to help you get a great night‚Äôs rest. By combining sleep meditation with a relaxing bedtime story, each episode will guide you gently towards sleep.

Feedback? Let us know your thoughts.

That's all for tonight. Sleep well, friends üò¥‚ù§Ô∏è

item.title: The Tea Plantation
item.description:
Welcome back sleepyheads. As we drift off to sleep tonight, we'll wander through a remote and relaxing tea plantation ¬†üò¥

  • New to Get Sleepy? Subscribe!
  • Loving Get Sleepy? Rate us on Apple Podcasts

Tonight's Episode

First, we'll begin with a sleep meditation to help you let go of any stress or worries. Then, we'll walk through rows of tea plants, learn a little about how tea is prepared, and sample some of the warm, fresh drink as we fall asleep.

  • Story Narrator: Simon Mattacks

About Get Sleepy

Get Sleepy is a twice weekly story-telling podcast designed to help you get a great night‚Äôs rest. By combining sleep meditation with a relaxing bedtime story, each episode will guide you gently towards sleep.

Feedback? Let us know your thoughts.

That's all for tonight. Sleep well, friends üò¥‚ù§Ô∏è

¬†That's all for tonight. Sleep well, friends üò¥‚ù§Ô∏è

item.title: The Long Drive
item.description:
Welcome back sleepyheads. Tonight, we have a long, relaxing car ride to help guide you to sleep üò¥

  • New to Get Sleepy? Subscribe!

First, settle in with a progressive relaxation exercise that we're bringing back due to popular demand. Then, fall asleep on a relaxing car ride on the way to a secluded mountain cabin.

item.title: The Stars of Tekapo
item.description:
Welcome back to another sleep-inducing episode of Get Sleepy.

  • New to Get Sleepy? Subscribe!
  • Loving Get Sleepy? Rate us on Apple Podcasts

Tonight's Episode

We'll first wind down with a short sleep meditation designed to do away with worry. Then, I'll take you on a journey to the Lake Tekapo area of New Zealand. For those fascinated by the night sky and the infinity of space, this is the perfect place for an expansive glimpse of what exists beyond our world.

  • Story Narrator: Thomas Jones

About Get Sleepy

Get Sleepy is a twice weekly podcast with the goal of helping you get a great night‚Äôs rest. By combining sleep meditation with a relaxing story, each episode will guide you gently towards sleep.

item.title: Each Corner of the House
item.description:
I'm so excited by the reception so far for Get Sleepy.

You all are so amazing, and it warms my heart to read all of the reviews and feedback you've left for the podcast.

We're capping off launch-week with this great story, and we'll be back with more new episodes next week.

Tonight's story is narrated by the amazing T.K. Kellman, who will be a regular narrator on this podcast. His deep, gravely tones are like an ASMR brain massage. You're going to love it.

New to Get Sleepy? Subscribe!

Loving Get Sleepy? Rate us on iTunes (we'll love you forever).

Feedback? Let us know your thoughts.

Thats all for now, happy sleeping üò¥

item.title: The Venetian Lagoon
item.description:
Launch week keeps on rolling. ¬†So happy you're here!¬†

Tonight, after a short gratitude meditation, we'll take a relaxing trip through the scenic canals and waterways of Venice.

This story is narrated by the talented Abbe Opher, who will be contributing regularly to Get Sleepy. Her soothing British accent is a perfect companion as you drift off to sleep. You're going to love it.

New to Get Sleepy? Subscribe!

Love Get Sleepy? Rate us on iTunes (we'll love you forever).

Feedback? Let us know your thoughts.

Thats all for now, happy sleeping üò¥

¬†

¬†

item.title: The Castle Garden
item.description:
New to Get Sleepy? Subscribe!

Love Get Sleepy? Rate us on iTunes (we'll love you forever).

Feedback? Let us know your thoughts.

Welcome to the inaugural episode of Get Sleepy. Our maiden voyage, to the land of dreams. We are embarking on a very special journey, and we're so happy you're along for the ride.

Hi, my name is Thomas, and I'm so glad you're here. What is Get Sleepy? A sleep meditation? Yes, in a sense. A story? Also, yes.

We combine several proven relaxation methods to help calm the mind and let you fall asleep easy each and every night.

Make sure to subscribe, and you'll get two sleep-inducing episodes delivered to you each and every week.

Bye for now, and happy sleeping üò¥

¬†
